Description.Name: You Wouldn't Download a Holovid
Description.Details: "No," Darius says, firmly. His jaw is set as he folds his arms and stares pointedly at you over the holographic display in the command center. "Oh, c'mon!" You protest. "It's a small risk, sure, but the pay-off is absolutely worth it!" You and Darius have been arguing back and forth for the last fifteen minutes. You're convinced that you can flip this wayward shipment of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHolovidMercenaries],MERCENARIES!]] before anybody in the crew finds out about it. Darius, on the other hand, is not. "Yang'll throw a fit if he hears about this. You know that," Darius reiterates. "You're playing with fire here." "And? Three million, Darius." Eventually, he sighs and throws up his hands. "Fine, go ahead, but don't whine to me if this comes back to bite us."

Description.Name: Trawl the local network for buyers.
Option 1
Description.Details:
Your listing for the holovid series lasts a whole two hours at the outrageous price before you get your first bite. It seems that entertainment is pretty hard to come by in this system, or perhaps you found a very dedicated collector.

With the utmost secrecy, you organise a dead drop to prevent anybody in the crew from learning of the deed and cash out.

Description.Name: Do a little video piracy. As a treat.
Option 1
Description.Details: As you're browsing the various commercial networks, you're struck with an epiphany. Why sell just one copy of the holovids? Oh ho ho, delightfully devilish, {COMMANDER.FirstName}. Surely there wouldn't be an kind of anti-piracy systems in place for a series enjoyed mostly by [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePeriphery],Periphery]] yokels. Box set in hand, you rush down to Engineering. Farah looks less than amused as you explain the scheme to her. If her brow dropped any lower it would be touching her chin. Reluctantly, she accepts the holovids from you. "I'll let you know when I'm done, I suppose, Commander," she says with an air of defeat. A few hours later and you've flooded the local market with bootleg copies of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHolovidMercenaries],MERCENARIES!]] Surely this won't cause problems.
